java.nio.file

Class FileTreeWalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.file.FileTreeWalker

  •  class FileTreeWalker
extends Object
    Simple file tree walker that works in a similar manner to nftw(3C).
    See Also:
    Files.walkFileTree(java.nio.file.Path, java.util.Set<java.nio.file.FileVisitOption>, int, java.nio.file.FileVisitor<? super java.nio.file.Path>)
